UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Novel structural determinants and bacterial death-related regulatory effects of the scorpion defensin BmKDfsin4 against gram-positive bacteria.
Literature.Author: Yang X, Zhang H, Zuo Z, Qin C, Liu Y, Cao Z, Wu Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus AB94004(MIC=0.5µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis AB208187(MIC=3.0±1.0µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis AB208187(MIC=2µM)
